concept.title: Removed document-type shells and domains
concept.shortdesc: The classification map and classification domain has been removed.

conbody.p: The grammar files for both the classification map and classification domain have been relocated to an OASIS Open GitHub repository. These grammar files have been updated to work with DITA 2.0, and implementations are welcome to download and use them.
Alternatively, the new subjectrefs attribute is designed to replace much of the functionality offered by the classification domain.
